column4: ok, having a problem with utorrent, which actually seems to be having problems with ntfs-3g, here's syslog output: http://paste.ubuntu.com/36012/
can anyone help me figure out how to fix the problem?
well, gee, seems like everyone is wearing their sarcasm hats in lieu of their helping hats
thanks a lot guys
on a serious note does the drive work fine otherwiese?
yeah, it works on a windows machine and on a mac just fine
no in linux are you able to use the ntfs drive normally.
yeah, usually
I can watch videos from it, and so forth
yes but can you write to it.
yeah, the torrent started off fine, it just seems to have a problem reading what it wrote
sorry, that made no sense, I mean this one torrent seems to be the only problem
can you write to the ntfs drive.
yes
well then perhaps utorent is the problem.
try using transmission and see if you continue to get errors other wise I would ask the wine guys perhaps.
/j #winehq
ok, I guess I'll try it
hey, Transmission doesn't even seem to be able to download at all
linkage?
whatever page you can't play sound from
